# Robot Self-Healing Web Listener ðŸ¤–ðŸ©¹

AI-powered self-healing locator listener for Robot Framework.
Automatically repairs broken XPath / CSS / ID locators using DOM analysis and LLMs.

## Features
- Works as Robot Listener (API v3)
- YAML, Python & Robot locator healing
- Azure OpenAI integration
- DOM + interactable-aware healing
- Popup detection & dismissal
- Safe YAML updates with style preservation

## Installation

```bash
pip install web_SRE_ENGINE
